website_summaries.verdict: A nice, attractive option for small living spaces and small TVs, but keep in mind that though the build is strong, the veneer coating is subpar in comparison.
pros: A small yet sturdy model that is perfect for tight spaces
Sports a retro look that is both fun and classic
cons: Large TVs won't fit on it, and the veneer it's coated with has the tendency to chip and peel

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I recently bought the Altra Owen 42" Tetro TV Stand for our new place. We decided to make the purchase after we read most of the reviews and looked at all the pictures. Delivery took a week, all of the pieces that we needed for assembly were neatly organized in clear bags with labels and assembly was very easy. It's very sturdy without looking bulky. There's a backing (for the shelf part) that comes with it but we decided not to assemble it with the furniture because we wanted to see through the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: CypherPtV

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this! I also got the coffee table and ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! I also got the coffee table and ended up purchasing the "Furinno french oak bookcase" which is the exact same grey wood as this set. Now my living room looks very complete and put together! I have received compliments from all of our guests and they were shocked when I told them the price, because they look so much more expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Moloney

customer_reviews.title: Amazing retro design at the right price
customer_reviews.text: This TV stand looks so much more expensive than what I paid for it. I love the wood grain finish. People have commented that it looks really cool both the finish and the retro design. This is a much better deal than going out to Walmart and getting some cheap cookie cutter tv stand out of cheap particle wood. Believe it or not, the particle wood? Here used is actually decent. I mean the slab Is pretty thick and solid. I have confidence it will hold and last for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Just taking one of the stickers off made some of the outer coating (the part that makes it look like wood) come off And also some of the hardware went through the board coming through the top. I won't return bc that's a hassle and it's put together. I would not buy a piece made by this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Waits

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for Those on a Budget
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece. It was very easy to put together. It's sturdy. I can stand on top of it and it doesn't budge. I love the faux wood finish. It doesn't look tacky and has a nice gray color, like aged wood. I love the hairpin legs. For someone on a budget, you get the mid-century look for a fraction of the cost, without compromising sturdiness. I'm all about that.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie A.

customer_reviews.title: Great hairpin legs, great buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Everything was snug even though not everything lined up. Looks great, but actually a little deeper than I was expecting. Overall great stand, really sturdy (I have a 50" heavy flatscreen on it with no problems) and if anything else, if I don't like the table, I can put the hairpin legs on something else.
customer_reviews.author: clairehealy1202

customer_reviews.title: It made my daughter happy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is in college. She is in love with anything vintage and this was right up her alley. It was delivered to her door and she (proudly) put it together all by herself! It is sturdy enough for her tv, which is a 48", as well as her trinkets and books. And she loves the extra storage shelves. Great price and a great product!
customer_reviews.author: hrhinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love my tv stand. It is a lot taller than I had thought it was so tall and wide, I had to get a bigger TV...no problem. I have a 48inch and it seems to be nice and comfy. anything smaller would look really awkward. The color is a light wood and works well with grays or lavender colors.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Very solid, easy to assemble and looks pretty nice in my living room - Great Value Cons: - The back panel of fiberboard should really be at least twice as thick but, as its not visible, its not that much of an issue - The veneer/overall finish on the Main panels could be better particularly at the edges of the stand, but it's passable Overall a good buy, especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Tarun Thirumavalavan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I almost have a full set! I’ve got the dresser and desk by Ameriwood too. Ate TV stand looks great. It’s solid wood and it was easy to assemble. The back panel has a cord separator plenty of space for game consoles or games. (The TV is 32in for size reference)
customer_reviews.author: Vance

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble and really thick and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble and really thick and sturdy. I'm honestly impressed with the quality given the price. The color is grayish brown rather than a solid gray but it's still very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer  H.

customer_reviews.title: Good piece for the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our tv and Xbox in our loft. It's simple, clean and not cumbersome at all for the small space. The wood is not the highest quality but looks like it will hold up for a while.
customer_reviews.author: bhatnaa1

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble and it fits my 40” tv perfectly. Only a screwdriver required. Very strong and sturdy. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ameriwood TV stand holds sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, very sturdy placed 40’’ flat screen on top and fits perfect... a little heavy to manuever so get a friend to help. Absolutely no complaints. Looks great in any room.
customer_reviews.author: Onecaddy13

customer_reviews.title: IT’S NOT WOOD
customer_reviews.text: Great looking table, except it’s false advertising. Listed as “Wood” but it’s not. Packaging Stickers removed texture finish of the table along with it. Now i have a table with patches of missing finish all over it.
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, the color is very neutral and you have ...
customer_reviews.text: This could not have been easier to put together! I single handedly fitted, screwed in, and placed it upright, and it took me about an hour. Very sturdy, the color is very neutral and you have to love those legs! Well packed with all of the little bits in bags that did not go awol. Directions were simple and understandable. This product is terrific!
customer_reviews.author: social worker for children

customer_reviews.title: it is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Got my money's worth. I read the 1 star reviews, and must say, for the money paid, it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Drorit Or

customer_reviews.title: This tv stand is great! It was a little too heavy for me ...
customer_reviews.text: This tv stand is great! It was a little too heavy for me to carry but luckily I had some help. It was easy to follow the directions and assemble by myself (although I do recommend having at least another person to help). It took me an hour and a half to assemble myself. But I love the look of this tv stand! It makes my living room feel more modern. It's the perfect size for my 32" tv and wifi router. It's also the perfect height to view from my sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Mystique

customer_reviews.title: Love it but its more brown than i thought
customer_reviews.text: Love it but its more brown than i thought. Good quality though and I put it together myself in about 30 minutes. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Shana Randell

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My tv stand arrived right on time and securely packaged. The instructions, while vague, were easy to follow and I had it assembled in 20 minutes. They even include extra hardware in the event that the ones enclosed should disappear into a black hole. I'm not what you'd call handy, so I was beyond delighted that it came together so nicely. It's a lovely addition to my mid century modern living room and good quality for the price point. You won't be disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece! Looking forward to buy the whole set now
customer_reviews.author: beanpole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, the quality is great and I’m very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Simple
customer_reviews.text: It's solidly built, very easy to put together, and quite stylish. It's not particularly, large, though. It works well in a small apartment with a limited amount of equipment or objects to be stored. For a full A/V or HiFi setup it would be a little small.
customer_reviews.author: wbh6

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: The color is a wormer tone than the image, but the build quality is fantastic. It's held up to a couple years of use. Great style.
customer_reviews.author: Luke J. Axelson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: The finished stand is exactly as pictured. We love the hairpin legs. The surface of the stand is a paper photo based surface, not veneer. But it meets our needs. It went together without any problems and is sturdy enough for our 49 inch tv and sound bar. We do wish it came in a darker color.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to assemble, love this
customer_reviews.text: This tv stand was easy to put together by myself. The directions and parts are labeled neatly. My tv is a 48 inch and still fits on the stand great. Simple and trendy piece.
customer_reviews.author: Brit G

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Delivery: Fast Product: Good for the price, quality, looks great on the living room. Easy to assemble, instructions were clear.
customer_reviews.author: IngridV.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and modern!
customer_reviews.text: Great Tv stand that properly holds a sleek and modern look for any living room! In addition, the cord ports in the back make it convenient for the hiding of cables
customer_reviews.author: Kenaniah C.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Looks more expensive than it is. Was relatively easy to assemble, but doesn't completely stay together - not an issue unless you need to move it.
customer_reviews.author: steen

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING TV STAND! WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful TV stand. Super easy to assemble and very light weight surprisingly. I 100% would recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble. Love the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Caul

customer_reviews.title: I'ma real adult nowww
customer_reviews.text: I broke it putting it together, I was able to get it together once the top was attached. The bottom portion is the hard part. I did not have a drill so I do imagine it'd be put together better with a drill as it was suggested in the directions so I can't rate this low because I didn't have the proper tools and it's still functioning. It's very nice in my living room and I got the coffee table as well and they look great together. Now everything looks cohesive.
customer_reviews.author: dollface

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much I had to buy 2!! Quality, color are exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and very modern looking
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and very modern looking. Beware of shipping, they promise one date when you order then the next day they change the arrival date for longer.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Sturdy and clean line aesthetic. It's holding my 32" LED tv and haven't had any problems w/the tv stand functions.
customer_reviews.author: CAMERON RYAN

customer_reviews.title: Solid and reliable tv stand
customer_reviews.text: very solid, very sturdy and looks good enough. Great pin legs. My TV is 48 inches and it fit perfectly. Happy with it. the faux wood finish isn't anything to crow about. I am tempted to stain it or something to match my wood floors better but other than that its fantastic for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Seon M

customer_reviews.title: Obviously Particle board
customer_reviews.text: In reading past reviews I wonder if I even got the same item as the other posters. This is VERY obviously particle board. It does not look or feel like real wood, there is no mistake. It's not textured as another reviewer mentioned, and I can easily see the wood design chipping off down the road with more use. Knowing this, I still like it. For $90 it's probably worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lennox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. An amazing buy!
customer_reviews.text: Freaking GORGEOUS. This is so unique and simple. It looks absolutely perfect in my living room. My mom was babysitting my 4 year old when it arrived and "they both" were able to put it together in less than an hour. It holds my 42" smart TV beautifully and feels really sturdy. It's received many compliments and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: AlyG

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Loved how it looked in our apartment! You can tell it’s not real wood but for the price and style it was worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: WillNay

customer_reviews.title: Great if you like simple, neat pieces
customer_reviews.text: This tv stand is everything I was hoping it would be. It's different, sturdy, unique while still looking great, not easily scratched (yet.. and8 my 4yr old has had his trains running on it already). Also assembly was easy. I hope this piece lasts for a long time. The particle? did not peel or crack on me when I was assembling. And the color is a nice neutral. Totally recommend this line of furniture. I'm considering getting the end tables as well.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stand!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tv stand it’s stylish, great color and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Shannah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Very very easy to put together, and looks great! The holes in the back for cords are great, though seem potentially a little brittle (though mine have not cracked) The only bummer about this piece of furniture is it does not cover the wires since it doesn't touch the floor. But it is a great looking TV stand so it makes up for it!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: This is a very cool looking TV stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool looking TV stand. Assembly was simple and it was delivered on time. We also bought 2 of the matching end tables and the set really goes well together. We love the retro "Jetsons" vibe they give off while still looking modern with the grey/blue wood grain tones. Eventually we will get the bookshelf too and maybe the desk for our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Tadichoke

customer_reviews.title: Take A Stand
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together but make sure to follow the manual page by page! I really like how the back holes hide cords & how deep the 'pockets' are. I don't care that it's not real wood because it doesn't look anything like wood anyway!
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: awesome tv stand!!!
customer_reviews.text: this tv stand is very durable and despite price, high quality. makes our space look much more tidy & organized. we were able to fit a PlayStation console on left & a tv box on the right hand slot - and our tv is 36" - fits perfect. the wood is like a driftwood color tone and the teal legs give it personality, very retro. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: NiNE

customer_reviews.title: Great TV stand
customer_reviews.text: Great TV stand! I, like others, was afraid it wouldn't be sturdy enough but the table is actually a lot heavier than I expected. It was easy to assemble and is strong enough to support my 42'' flatscreen which is a little older (2009), heavier and wider than current flatscreens.
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: It's veneer but it definitely is very nice veneer. I was so happy with the product ...
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased the TV Stand. When it arrived, I was stunned by the quality (and the weight!) of the wood. It's veneer but it definitely is very nice veneer. I was so happy with the product I bought the desk and coffee table in the same style. This is my first time purchasing furniture on Amazon and was pleasantly surprised at how great the experience was. Kudos to Altra Owen!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Zhong

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, sturdy, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. It's sleek, sturdy, and VERY easy to assemble. Has a great, chill, mid-century modern vibe. The legs are held on with bolts so I know they will be easy to remove if we need to move. Each shelf has it's own hole for cords. I would say the color is slightly darker than the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C

customer_reviews.title: Much sturdier than one would think!
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the fact that there is some light assembly fool you! This thing is solid and has some heft to it! Great color and sturdiness. It also has an access port for cables in the back. We love the mid/mod look with the hairpin legs too! Great value for what we paid!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: This product is AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING!!!! I really could write paragraph after paragraph of all the features I loved but here's what you need to know. This is quality build, they send screws / parts that don't bend and strip out the second you try to use them and they even send a bag of spare parts. This is the FIRST TIME in my LIFE I have ever gotten together a piece of furniture without swearing like a sailor. The quality is so damn good I'm never going near some POS from Target again and I'm so excited for the matching bookshelf to arrive next!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Build Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast. Easy to assemble. Nice packaging. All the pieces were there. Build a lot better than some of this cheap pressboard crap. It actually feelins and weighs like real wood.
customer_reviews.author: Zayne

customer_reviews.title: If you like the look buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy. Solid. Easy to put together even if you are clueless, which I am. Better than I expected. Darker than I thought it was but turned out that's good. It kind of disappears from your view when watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: Benji9999

customer_reviews.title: Super cool TV stand
customer_reviews.text: This one was the most challenging of the set to put together, but still pretty easy in terms of at home furniture assembly. People LOVE this piece, I get compliments on it all of the time. I love the whole line.
customer_reviews.author: M. Medawar

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quicker than expected. Very easy to assemble. It took me 40 minutes - and that includes taking it apart and building it correctly a second time because I didn't bother using the enclosed instructions. Very solid and nice piece.
customer_reviews.author: shaz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A really well planned piece of furniture. Easy to put together and sturdy. The wood seems a little shiny in a cheap way, but otherwise I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Simple and useful!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Well made. Easy to build. It's perfect if you want to hide all the cables from showing in the bottom on the stand. I can fit my two game consoles in one slot and use the other for the controls. I have a 40" TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not use drill!
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV stand! It was a bit of a hassle in the beginning to build bc the screws didn't go in properly and if a drill were to be used you can tell it was going to break it. Besides that everything else went smoothly and was easy to assemble. I did buy the coffee table and side table along with this and I love the whole set :)
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Perez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good sturdy quality and only took 15 minutes to put together. It's super simple and even comes with extra parts just in case something gets lost.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Moein

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: We moved and I vowed to get rid of the awful cabinet type entertainment center that was always a pain for installing new devices; and I install new devices all the time. The tabletop allows for easy placement and removal of all my various streaming devices; no more squeezing behind the TV to find HDM ports. The two compartments are perfect for everything, including a tidy place for remotes. It took under an hour to put together with the surprisingly easy to understand instructions. The only con was that the box was crazy heavy and I had to take the individual pieces out and bring them inside. I'm sure the delivery guy hates me now.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff on Vashon Island

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tv console
customer_reviews.text: Awesome love the vintage look. Easy assembly, took less than 30 minutes from box to setting the tv on top! The color hides dust too, for those of you who don't like to dust much!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper_101

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I was expecting something a bit cheaper in wood but this is solid as they come. Very good quality product and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: A. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This collection is fantastic. It's simplistic
customer_reviews.text: This collection is fantastic. It's simplistic, modern, incredibly sturdy, and a great price. I have the TV stand, coffee table, and end table.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lib

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice table. Heavy. The back is cool, with great access for cords. Easy to put together. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Soto

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged. The top was chipped and I had to glue it back on. No time to wait for a replacement. Very cheap furniture. You get what you pay for. But it was disappointing that it was damaged. Otherwise I would give it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but poorly made
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking table but poorly made. It's sturdy enough for my purposes as a turntable station but when assembling most of the boards were incorrectly drilled or lacking holes for screws. I had to order 3 separate replacement parts for this. I decided to make my own holes instead of waiting for all the other pieces and so far it works fine. I really do like how it looks but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Shane

customer_reviews.title: Look sophisticated on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: Super solid and heavy. Looks nearly identical to stands at the hip local store selling for 5X the price. In fact, friends initially ask if thats where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. I love this table. It's shorter than I had expected but looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Baruch

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great value, extremely classy TV stand.
customer_reviews.text: High quality, great value, extremely classy TV stand. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: AaronR

customer_reviews.title: Cool retro look
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy product, beautiful piece, and gave my living room a very cool retro-like look. Love it
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I'm downsizing and this is perfect for my small 24" TV with built in dvd player.
customer_reviews.author: Husband and Wife from Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy table; easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, sturdy table; heavy, even though it's not real wood. Easy to assemble-- took me about 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Reading_girl234

customer_reviews.title: I really like this TV stand its sturdy and holds my DVR ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this TV stand its sturdy and holds my DVR and cable box well
customer_reviews.author: ronda dougherty

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Love it and it was cheaper here than at Target. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KMB

customer_reviews.title: high quality and amazing color. Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as shown, high quality and amazing color. Very happy with this!!
customer_reviews.author: Laylalk

customer_reviews.title: It's also very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the high quality of the materials and the professionalism in packaging! It's also very easy to assemble. Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Mwd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very sturdy and good quality and so cheap too!! I love it. It was easy to assemble too.
customer_reviews.author: sunbright

customer_reviews.title: Great tv stand!
customer_reviews.text: Love the clean lines. Actually makes my small room look larger because it is not bulky. Easy to put together and very sturdy. Live ot!
customer_reviews.author: tree

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Looks great in my bedroom with the side table.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: You  need this with your desk!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I purchased this to accompany my desk. It is heavy and well made. Simple to put together too!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah N

customer_reviews.title: coffee table is put together and fine but the TV stand came without any of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Help! I ordered both coffe table and TV stand, coffee table is put together and fine but the TV stand came without any of the pieces to put it together, and it only came with two legs.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Screws on this immediately started to strip upon assembly. TV stand fell apart while I was assembling. The only part of this product I found useful was the bottom base part that I have been using a cheap side table.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy. had for a year. so nice looking .everyone loves it.
customer_reviews.author: ashley greco

customer_reviews.title: True love!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! It is simple, sleek and sturdy. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved it, I broke it a little while putting ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved it, I broke it a little while putting it together, but it was my bad, the product is very heavy and solid, really good price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Jima

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and perfect for our awkward TV that is a flat screen but still has a base to it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Very stylish and perfect for our flat screen tv that awkwardly has a base still, so the TV stand is sleek but big enough for it. The hair pin legs are perfect. Only minor flaw and it is barely noticeable is the back to side part is misaligned ever so slightly. It was worth it for the price. (I think it was on sale when I purchased it)
customer_reviews.author: S. H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the style, the look, everything. It is also very sturdy and well built
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Altra!
customer_reviews.text: Great finish and sturdy product! So glad I found Altra products; love their minimalist style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, design and easy to assemble for a small price
customer_reviews.author: PabloM

customer_reviews.title: New TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, fits perfect where I wanted to place it.Nice to have all my components in one spot.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Modern & Chic
customer_reviews.text: In love with my TV stand & side table. They are the perfect fit for my small space & they definitely add modern chicness to my apartment!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: Simple and cute! Perfect for smaller rooms.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Easy to put together and fits in my one bedroom condo perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Linds

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Great item, even better price. Easy to assemble and is a very attractive piece, love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great piece of furniture. Easy enough to assemble, and a really chic aesthetic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love this! And it's a great deal for a super modern design!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have very limited furniture building experience and got this baby done in under an hour. Looks great, but it is damn heavy and I'm a bit worried that the weight distribution of the pin legs is going to dent my hardwood floor... only time will tell!

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

product_meta.title: Ameriwood Home Owen Retro TV Stand for TVs up to 42", Weathered Oak
product_meta.description: Modern, transitional and industrial styles all come together in the Ameriwood Home Owen Retro TV Stand for TVs up to 42”. Able to support up to 50 lbs., this simple yet stylish stand made of laminated particleboard has a slim design ideal for smaller spaces. Place a 42” TV on the top surface’s brown oak finish while you house the DVD player, cable box and remotes in the 2 cubbies below. Supported on gray hairpin-style metal legs, this TV stand boasts a mid-century design retro enthusiasts will love. Assembly is required, with the final dimensions measuring 24.6"h x 42"w x 19.6"d.
feature_bullets: Set your 42” TV on the industrial-style Ameriwood Home Owen Retro TV Stand
Stow the remote, DVD player and speakers in the 2 open cubbies
Assembly required. Dimensions: 24.6"h x 42"w x 19.6"d. Shipping weight is approximately 51.55 lbs
Laminated particleboard makes up the top surface, with powder-coated metal for the legs
Finish the look with the addition of other items from the Owen series (sold separately)
